values.content:
=You are an expert recruiter.
Given a job title and a job description, suggest up to 6 possible job titles that best match the job description. 
Expand abbreviations (e.g., VP → Vice President), normalize wording, and include common variations. 
Keep the titles concise and professional, without adding levels beyond what is implied. 

You MUST output ONLY a single, valid JSON object with the following structure:
{
  "job_titles": ["title 1", "title 2", "title 3"]
}

actorId.cachedResultName: LinkedIn Profile Search Scraper No Cookies ✅ Find all people 📧 (harvestapi/linkedin-profile-search)

nodes.name: Check if a person is a connection

parameters.excludeFields: is_connection, is_pending, row_number, _source, ['Email Sent'], ['Connection Sent'], actionType, myNewField

parameters.subject: =Exciting Opportunity for {{ $json['Job Title'] }} – Apply Now
parameters.message:
= Opportunity — {{$json['Job Title']}}

Opportunity at Infinity & Beyond

Role: {{$json['Job Title']}}

Hello {{$json.fullName ? $json.fullName.split(' ')[0] : 'there'}},

I came across your LinkedIn profile and wanted to reach out because your experience aligns well with a role we’re currently hiring for – {{$json['Job Title']}} at Infinity & Beyond.

We’ve already run your profile through our ATS system, and your skills stood out. If this role sounds interesting, please upload your resume so we can move to the next step.

Upload Your Resume

If you’re not interested right now, no worries — feel free to ignore this message. If you'd like to learn more before applying, reply to this email and I’ll be happy to share details.

Thanks & best regards,
Nayaki
HR · Infinity & Beyond
hr@infinityandbeyond.example.com

This is an automated message – replies are monitored. To opt out of future messages, reply with "unsubscribe".

parameters.subject: Subject
parameters.message:
= Candidate Report

Candidate Report

Automatically generated via n8n
{{$json["htmlRows"]}}
Job Title Location Full Name Primary Email LinkedIn LinkedinAction Match Score EmailSent Inbound/Outbound Job Board
© 2025 Talent Automation · Generated by n8n

parameters.jsCode: return [ { json: { htmlRows: items.map(item => ` ${item.json['Job Title'] || 'N/A'} ${item.json['Location'] || 'N/A'} ${item.json['Full Name'] || 'N/A'} ${item.json['Email'] || 'N/A'} Profile ${item.json['LinkedinAction'] || '(empty)'} ${item.json['ATS Score'] || '0%'} ${item.json['EmailSent'] || '(empty)'} ${item.json['Inbound | Outbound'] || 'N/A'} ${item.json['Job Board'] || 'N/A'} `).join('') } } ]

conditions.leftValue: ={{   (() => {     const tenure = $json.Tenure_Formatted || "";     if (tenure.includes("Less than")) return 0;      const years = parseInt((tenure.match(/(\d+)y/) || [0,"0"])[1], 10);     const months = parseInt((tenure.match(/(\d+)m/) || [0,"0"])[1], 10);      return years * 12 + months;   })() }}

values.content:
Analyze the following Job Description (JD) and Candidate's profile. Provide a structured evaluation that simulates an ATS (Applicant Tracking System) scoring process.|1. Scoring SystemAssign an Overall Match Score (0–100%) using these weights:Skills & Technical Keywords – 40% Experience & Role Relevance – 30% Education & Credentials – 10% Keyword Optimization & Phrasing – 10% ATS Compliance & Formatting – 10% 2. Keyword & Synonym HandlingFull weight for exact keyword matches (e.g., “Python”).Half weight for synonyms/variants (e.g., “ML” vs “machine learning”).Always highlight missing critical exact keywords.3. Role AdaptabilityIf JD is specialized (e.g., Data Scientist) → prioritize technical depth.If JD is generalist (e.g., Project Manager) → prioritize leadership, collaboration, and business impact.4. Components to ConsiderHard Skills: Programming languages, tools, certifications, domain expertise.Soft Skills: Leadership, communication, teamwork, problem-solving.Experience Alignment: Years of experience, relevance of roles, industry exposure, career progression.Education & Credentials: Degrees, majors, licenses, certifications.Achievements & Measurable Impact: Revenue growth, efficiency gains, % metrics, cost savings.ATS Formatting: Section clarity, standard headers, no images/tables, keyword-rich phrasing.

5. Output Format Produce results in the following structure:
Full Name: Full Name of the Candidate
ID: ID of the candidate
Overall Match Score: X%
Category Breakdown:Skills & Technical Keywords: X% Experience & Role Relevance: X% Education & Credentials: X% Keyword Optimization & Phrasing: X% ATS Compliance & Formatting: X% Top 5 Strengths:………Top 5 Gaps:………
Conclusion: write overall conclusion

You are a Talent Acquisition assistant. Communicate professionally, clearly, and politely, while being friendly and approachable. Use concise, inclusive language, maintain a positive tone, and guide candidates with clear next steps. Always represent the company in a helpful and respectful manner.

main.node: Check if a person is a connection
